levels.description: Attack Interval <@ba.vup>decreases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, and attacks up to <@ba.vup>{attack@max_target}</> <@ba.rem>blocked</> enemies at a time; Immediately deploys two pieces of Tactical Equipment on ground tiles within Attack Range (After deployment, surrounding enemies are <$ba.stun>Stunned</> for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds, and the blocked enemies' DEF <@ba.vup>-160</>)
